text: is a Japanese fiction writer and literary critic. Takenishi is best known for her semi-autobiographical short story "The Rite" (1963), which tells of her experience surviving the Atomic Bombing of Hiroshima. In 2012 she was named a Person of Cultural Merit for her writing. ==References== ==External links== * Hiroko Takenishi at J'Lit Books from Japan Category:1929 births Category:Japanese women writers Category:Living people Category:Hibakusha
